sections.title: Soul Warden (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Soul Warden class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Soul wardens gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Soul wardens advance their previous divine spellcasting class levels for spells per day, spells known, and effective caster level only.

sections.title: Channel Damage (Su) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Functions like cleric channel positive energy but only damages undead, using soul warden level as effective cleric level and stacking with other channel energy classes.

sections.title: Focus Item (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Soul wardens must present a focus item to channel damage or cast spells requiring divine focus.

sections.title: Channel Casting (Su) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Expend channel damage uses to spontaneously cast specific undead-related spells, with higher-level spells unlocked as the soul warden advances.

sections.title: Corpse Whisperer (Ex) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Adds half soul warden level to Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks against undead, including control attempts.

sections.title: Bonus Feats (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Gains bonus feats from a specific list of channel energy and undead-focused feats every 3 levels starting at 3rd level.

sections.title: Harvest (Su) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Regains one use of channel damage when destroying undead with channel energy, channel damage, or instantaneous spells, up to class level uses per day.

sections.title: Undead Imposition (Su) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Expend channel damage use as standard action to control an undead within 30 feet for rounds equal to class level, with Will save negates.

sections.title: Negative Energy Ward (Su) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Creates a 15-foot radius ward that blocks low-HD undead and damages higher-HD undead that enter, lasting 1 minute per level.

sections.title: Necrotic Resistance (Su) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Reduces ability drain and negative levels by 1 at 8th level and by 2 at 10th level to a minimum of 0.

sections.title: Life Shell (Sp) (Soul Warden)
sections.description: Creates an antilife shell effect that only affects undead while granting fast healing 1 to living creatures inside, usable 10 minutes per day.
